articles.title: C.C., WPK Sends Congratulations to Revolutionary Party of Tanzania
articles.content:
C.C., WPK Sends Congratulations to Revolutionary Party of Tanzania
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Saturday sent a congratulatory message to the National Executive Committee of the Revolutionary Party of Tanzania on the occasion of its 40th founding anniversary.
					 The message said that the RPT has made great successes in its work to consolidate the country's political stability and national unity and achieve the socio-economic development over the past four decades since its founding.
					
					 It expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties having a fine tradition would grow stronger in the interests of the peoples of the two countries through the joint struggle for independence against imperialism.
					
					 It wished the RPT bigger success in the work to further strengthen itself and achieve the country's independent development and prosperity.

articles.title: Officials and Members of GFTUK Start Tour of Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Officials and Members of GFTUK Start Tour of Area of Mt. Paektu
 Hyesan, February 4 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) started their tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu in the run-up to the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 A kick-off ceremony took place before the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo on Saturday.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hyesan City and the statue of the President at the monument and paid tribute to them.
					
					 A report and speeches were at the ceremony.
					
					 They called on the GFTUK officials and members to prepare themselves to be strongest in idea and faith and the spirit of self-reliance and self-development by cherishing the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu through the tour.
					
					 They pledged to learn from the spirit of self-reliance, revolutionary optimism, patriotism and comradeship displayed by the anti-Japanese forerunners and thoroughly embody them in the on-going struggle for raising the hot wind of uninterrupted offensive and innovations in the spirit of Kangwon Province.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony they looked round the monument.

articles.title: Revolutionary Site in Mt Taedok Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Revolutionary Site in Mt Taedok Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
 Kaesong, February 4 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children are visiting the Revolutionary Site in Mt Taedok.
					 Preserved and displayed there are historic materials and relics which tell the visitors that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il inspected the post in February Juche 52 (1963) and in March Juche 85 (1996) and put up the slogan "a-match-for-a-hundred," energetically leading the work to develop the whole army into an invincible revolutionary army. 
					
					 The site has been visited by hundreds of thousands of service personnel and civilians over the past two decades.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
 Chongjin, February 4 (KCNA) -- The captain and crewmen of the Togo-flagged ship WUWUAN held a meeting on Saturday at Chongjin Port of the DPRK with the approach of February 8, the anniversary of the development of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) into the regular revolutionary armed forces by President Kim Il Sung.
					 The participants laid bouquets at the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting paid homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who founded the Korean People's Army and wisely led it along the road of steady victories.
					
					 They expressed belief that the KPA would win victory after victory as the strongest revolutionary armed forces under respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is creditably carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Preparations for Kimjongilia Festival near Completion
articles.content:
Preparations for Kimjongilia Festival near Completion
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Preparations are progressing at the final phase for the 21st Kimjongilia Festival to be held here with splendor on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Designs for the venue of the festival and others and posters have been completed in line with the theme of the festival "Kimjongilia in full bloom to bless the prospering era of Kim Jong Un".
					
					 The Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee is helping various institutions arrange their display stands and keep flowers in bloom while pushing forward projects to decorate the festival venue in a peculiar way.
					
					 Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias are in full bloom at the greenhouses of armed forces organs, commissions, ministries and national institutions and families in Pyongyang.
					
					 Several units such as the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, National Tourism Administration and the External Construction Guidance Bureau are very successful in the efforts to make the best contribution to the festival.
					
					 Working people and schoolchildren in the city are also making sincere efforts to contribute to the festival.

articles.title: Poster on 21st Kimjongilia Festival Produced
articles.content:
Poster on 21st Kimjongilia Festival Produced
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A poster on the 21st Kimjongilia Festival to be held in Pyongyang on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was produced.
					 Depicted on the poster is immortal Kimjongilia in full bloom with Jong Il Peak and the Paektusan Secret Camp for its background.
					
					 On its upper part are slogan "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us" and letters "The Day of the Shining Star" with the festival logo and fireworks displayed above Jong Il Peak.
					
					 On its lower part are letters "The 21st Kimjongilia Festival," festival venue and period.

articles.title: Believing in People as in Heaven, Life-long Motto of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Believing in People as in Heaven, Life-long Motto of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Believing in the people as in Heaven was the life-long motto of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Bearing in his mind the noble outlook on the people that one should pluck even a star and bring a flower into bloom even on a rock if they want, Kim Jong Il in his lifetime gave ceaseless field guidance for their wellbeing.
					
					 It was one day when he visited the construction site of the Samsu Power Station.
					
					 He asked officials concerned if they took any measures for evacuees, saying that dwelling houses behind the dam would be submerged after the completion of the power station. 
					
					 No matter how precious electricity is, it can never be allowed to give people any inconvenience and trouble, he stressed. And he urged them to build better houses for evacuees ahead of all.
					
					 After a few months, evacuees came to move to new houses.
					
					 Thanks to his great love and devotion for the people, there appeared a large number of monumental edifices for the people in the DPRK.
					
					 Therefore, the people in the DPRK always remember the great life of Kim Jong Il who had devoted his all for the people, regarding their happiness as his greatest pleasure.

articles.title: DPRK Will Bolster up Capability for Self-Defence in Every Way: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Bolster up Capability for Self-Defence in Every Way: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A recent issue of the U.S. magazine Foreign Policy said that since the DPRK's nuclear and missile programs have already made too rapid progress and they are considered as an important affair of the state, there is little likelihood to give up them for the purpose of improving the relations with the U.S. It seems no diplomatic agreement can succeed in pressing the DPRK to abandon its nuclear weapon and missile programs, but diplomacy is still necessary and there is an opportunity to prevent the situation from going to worse as it has not yet test-fired ICBM, the magazine added.
					 It went on: The Trump administration should propose the DPRK to adjust military drills in 2017. During the Clinton administration, the annual joint military drill Team Spirit had been suspended. It is necessary to cut down the scale of the military drills, though belatedly.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This reflects the present situation in which the structure of muscle between the DPRK and the U.S. has dramatically changed and proves that the U.S. is the arch criminal escalating the tension and, therefore, it should move first.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons is an inevitable outcome of the U.S. heinous hostile policy toward the DPRK pursued for a long time.
					
					 It is the stand of the DPRK not to hesitate or make any concession in bolstering up its capability for self-defence.
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it thinks the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK is a matter for political bargaining and economic deal after putting it on the negotiating table.
					
					 Explicitly speaking once again, the DPRK's bolstering of its nuclear force is the exercise of the right to self-defence to counter the U.S., the world's biggest nuclear weapons state bringing the danger of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK will continue to bolster up its capability for self-defence and preemptive attack with the nuclear force as its pivot as long as the U.S. and its vassal forces persist in its nuclear threat and blackmail.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses S. Korean Pro-U.S. Stooges' Diplomacy as Disgusting Political Caricature
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses S. Korean Pro-U.S. Stooges' Diplomacy as Disgusting Political Caricature
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- U.S. President Trump was reported to have a phone conversation with Hwang Kyo An, acting south Korean president, recently after his inauguration. And the new U.S. defense secretary flew into south Korea on Feb. 2. The south Korean puppet regime is now noisily trumpeting about "demonstration of close cooperation" and "fixed will to maintain alliance" with the U.S.
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Saturday derides this as a disgusting political caricature of the wicked pro-U.S. lackeys who cannot exist even a day without the U.S. backing.
					
					 The hectic diplomacy conducted by the puppet regime with the U.S. through which it vociferated about "close cooperation in the campaign against the north" and "strong warning" is nothing but foolhardy burlesque of the confrontational maniacs to do harm to the fellow countrymen in the north with the help of outsiders.
					
					 The puppet forces are now making desperate efforts to hold in check the dynamic advance of the DPRK demonstrating its tremendous might while meeting all challenges of history and weathering its trials with the might of self-reliance and self-development. These days they are disclosing their sordid scenario to ratchet up sanctions and pressure on the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. and other outsiders, claiming that the present time marks an "important watershed" in "leading the north to denuclearization and changes."
					
					 This is, however, as foolish an act as pricking one's own eyes with one's own hand.
					
					 The traitors will have to pay a dearer price for crazily pursuing sycophancy towards the U.S. and dependence on outsiders, remaining utterly indifferent to the destiny of the nation.

articles.title: Severe Punishment of Chief Criminal and Accomplice of Hideous Scandal Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Severe Punishment of Chief Criminal and Accomplice of Hideous Scandal Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The people's emergency action to oust the Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea reportedly held a meet-the press in Seoul on Feb. 2, calling for severe punishment of the chief criminal and accomplice involved in the hideous scandal.
					 At the meet-the press, speakers noted that Park Geun Hye offered witnesses in group in a bid to delay the decision on her impeachment.
					
					 They urged the "constitutional court" to exercise its right with strong attitude as an enough investigation was made to make a decision on impeachment without witnesses offered by her.
					
					 They denounced Hwang Kyo An for protecting the humiliating "agreement" with Japan, steering the THAAD deployment and inciting the danger of war though he has to stop and abrogate Park's policy.

articles.title: U.S. Defense Secretary's Visit to S. Korea Protested
articles.content:
U.S. Defense Secretary's Visit to S. Korea Protested
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Organizations of south Korea reportedly protested against the U.S. defense secretary's junket in Seoul on Feb. 2.
					 The emergency people's action for the resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime called a press conference, at which it clarified that the defense secretary's south Korean junket is aimed to put pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are going to take the visit as an opportunity of escalating military tension with the help of the U.S. and weathering their crisis, it charged.
					
					 Members of the action against deployment of THAAD and the people's action for peace against war staged a demonstration, chanting slogans demanding peace against THAAD and war.
					
					 They contended that the south Korean and U.S. authorities should immediately lift sanctions and pressure on the DPRK and opt for dialogue and negotiations without preconditions if they truly want a solution to the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Koreans in Russia Celebrate Lunar New Year's Day
articles.content:
Koreans in Russia Celebrate Lunar New Year's Day
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Korean organizations in Russia such as the United Confederation of Koreans in the Maritime Territorial Region and the Korean Autonomous Society for National Culture in the Maritime Territorial Region had celebration meetings in Artyom, Ussuriysk, Nakhodka and Partizansk cities between Jan. 27 and 29 to mark the Lunar New Year's Day.
					 Present there were chiefs of the Korean organizations and other compatriots of various circles in the Maritime Territory.
					
					 Invited were staff members of the diplomatic missions of the DPRK and various countries, delegate from the Russian Foreign Ministry and personages of the Maritime Territory administration and legislative assembly.
					
					 At the meetings speakers referred to the fact that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address set forth tasks for paving a broad avenue to independent reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad this year which marks the 45th anniversary of the July 4 joint statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Art performances were given there.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Serbia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Serbia
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A Serbian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, was formed in Belgrade on January 23.
					 Marijann Kubik, international secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party, was elected chairperson of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il between January 24 and February 17.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Pakistan
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Pakistan
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A Pakistani national preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, was formed in Karachi on January 23.
					 The committee decided to organize various political and cultural events praising the exploits of Kim Jong Il and introducing the achievements made by the Korean people in building a socialist power.

articles.title: Friendship Meeting Held in Angola
articles.content:
Friendship Meeting Held in Angola
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A friendship meeting was held in Luanda on Jan. 25 to mark the 40th anniversary of the opening of the DPRK embassy in Angola.
					 On display at its venue were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, flags of the DPRK and Angola and pictures showing the reality of Juche Korea.
					
					 Present at the meeting were officials of the Ministry for External Relations of Angola and the DPRK ambassador to Angola and his embassy staff members.
					
					 The participants looked round photos on display before watching a Korean film "Prosperous Pyongyang".
					
					 The DPRK ambassador said in his speech that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed great feats for developing the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 The director of the Asian and Oceanian Department of the Angolan Ministry for External Relations said that the Korean people are brothers of the Angolan people as they sincerely helped the latter in the worst period. The Angolan government extends full support and solidarity to the government and people of the DPRK in the struggle to achieve peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula and will as ever value and develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK, he stressed.
					
					 Then followed a reception.

articles.title: CC del PTC saluda 40o aniversario de fundacion del PRT
articles.content:
CC del PTC saluda 40o aniversario de fundacion del PRT
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 4 un mensaje de felicitacion al Comite Ejecutivo Nacional del Partido Revolucionario de Tanzania (PRT) con motivo del 40o aniversario de fundacion de esta agrupacion.
					 La misiva recuerda que durante 40 anos desde su fundacion, el PRT logro grandes exitos en sus tareas para consolidar la estabilidad politica del pais y la unidad nacional y alcanzar el desarrollo socioeconomico.
					
					  Continua que el CC del PTC esta seguro de que conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de ambos paises, se ampliaran y se desarrollaran cada dia las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos con excelente tradicion en la lucha conjunta por la independencia antiimperialista.
					
					  Formula votos por mayores exitos en los futuros trabajos del PRT para fortalecer la organizacion y lograr el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Miembros de FGSC inician recorrido por lugares de batalla revolucionaria de Paektu
articles.content:
Miembros de FGSC inician recorrido por lugares de batalla revolucionaria de Paektu
Hyesan, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 75o aniversario del nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quedo iniciado el recorrido de los funcionarios y miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea por los lugares de batalla revolucionaria en la zona del monte Paektu.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 4 la ceremonia de partida ante el Monumento a la Victoria en la Batalla de Pochonbo.
					
					Los participantes en la marcha rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente tras depositar cesto y ramos de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce erguidas en la ciudad de Hyesan y ante la estatua de bronce del Presidente edificada en el monumento arriba referido.
					
					En el acto hubo el informe e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que los funcionarios y miembros de la FGSC deben prepararse como los fuertes en la idea y conviccion y primeros abanderados de autofortalecimiento que tengan en carne propia el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, el de viento cortante del Paektu.
					
					Subrayaron la necesidad de aprender el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza, el optimismo revolucionario, el patriotismo y la camaraderia de los martires antijaponeses y materializarlos cabalmente en la lucha de hoy por dar auge al temperamento de ataque continuo e innovaciones continuas con el espiritu de la provincia de Kangwon.
					
					Terminado el acto de partida, los marchantes recorrieron el monumento.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun ridiculiza la caricatura politica de lacayos proyanquis surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun ridiculiza la caricatura politica de lacayos proyanquis surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el presidente estadounidense Trump converso por telefono, por primera vez despues de su toma de posesion, con el presidente interino surcoreano Hwang Kyo An. El pasado dia 2, el nuevo secretario de Defensa de EE.UU. llego al Sur de Corea. 
					Entonces, los titeres surcoreanos describen esos hechos como "demostracion de la cooperacion firme y alianza solida" con EE.UU.
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual de este sabado, lo califica de caricatura politica de los vendepatrias proyanquis y continua:
					
					Los maniacos de enfrentamiento expusieron su necio intento de acatar a la parte connacional con la ayuda de las fuerzas extranjeras al usar ademas la expresion de "cooperacion firme en la campana anti-Norte (de Corea)" y "fuerte advertencia".
					
					Ellos estan desesperados ahora para detener el avance vigoroso de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que manifiesta su poderio inagotable frustrando en el principio de autofortalecimiento todos los desafios y pruebas de la historia. 
					
					Recientemente, revelaron el intento de endurecer la sancion y presion anti-RPDC en confabulacion con EE.UU. y otras fuerzas extranjeras diciendo que ahora es el "momento crucial" para "inducir la desnuclearizacion y el cambio del Norte". 
					
					Pagaran muy caro sus actos traidores esos elementos serviles a EE.UU. y dependientes de las fuerzas extranjeras que no toman en consideracion el destino de la nacion.

articles.title: RPDC consolidara capacidad de autodefensa nacional, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
RPDC consolidara capacidad de autodefensa nacional, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- Recientemente, la revista estadounidense Foreign Policy escribio que el programa de arma nuclear y misil de Corea avanzo ya demasiado y se ha fijado como importante cuestion del Estado y por eso, no hay la posibilidad de renunciarlo a cambio del mejoramiento de las relaciones con Estados Unidos.
					 Prosiguio que aunque piensan que con ningun acuerdo diplomatico se puede hacer a Corea renunciar su arma nuclear y misil, en este caso tambien es necesaria la diplomacia.
					
					Agrego que existe la oportunidad de prevenir el empeoramiento de la situacion porque la RPDC todavia no realizo el lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM.
					
					 Opino que la administracion Trump debe proponer a la RPDC la moderacion de los ejercicios militares en 2017, recordando el antecedente de la suspension de los ejercicios militares conjuntos Team Spirit durante el mandato de Clinton.
					
					Especifico que hace falta reducir el tamano de los entrenamientos militares, aunque tardiamente.
					
					 Esta version refleja la realidad de hoy en que se ha cambiado radicalmente la estructura de las ferzas entre la RPDC y EE.UU. y demuestra que este debe moverse primero porque es el culpable principal de la agravacion de tension.
					
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este sabado y prosigue:
					
					 La posesion de arma nuclear por la RPDC es el resultado inevitable de la brutal y larga politica hostil de EE.UU. contra ella.
					
					 No vacilar ni ceder nunca en el camino de consolidacion de la capacidad de autodefensa nacional, esto es nuestra posicion.
					
					 Estaria muy equivocado si EE.UU. piensa todavia que nuestro disuasivo nuclear es una materia de regateo politico o transaccion economica que puede debatirse en la mesa de negociaciones.
					
					  Se reitera en claro que el aumento de nuestras fuerzas armadas nucleares es el justo ejercicio del derecho soberano frente a EE.UU., primera potencia nuclear del mundo, que trae el nubarron de guerra nuclear a la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Mientras continuen la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. y sus satelites, seguiremos elevando la capacidad de autodefensa nacional y de ataque preventivo con las fuerzas nucleares como eje.
